detailsData.title: Innovative Solutions
detailsData.content: Adam Leitman Bailey, P.C. invents new ways to practice law and new theories to solve its clients' problems, achieving results that have set new precedents.

detailsData.title: Landmark Victories
detailsData.content: The firm has participated and prevailed in many of the most important New York real estate cases of the millennium, changing the landscape of New York law.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Firm
detailsData.content: Adam Leitman Bailey, P.C. has received the highest honors and awards from the bar and ranking organizations, highlighting its leadership in real estate law.

detailsData.title: Expert Team
detailsData.content: By uniting many of the best real estate attorneys of its generation, Adam Leitman Bailey, P.C. has become one of New York’s most prominent real estate law firms.

address: 1 Battery Park Plaza, 18th Floor, New York, NY 10004
valueProp: By uniting many of the best real estate attorneys of its generation, Adam Leitman Bailey, P.C. has become one of New York’s most prominent real estate law firms. The firm excels by solely practicing real estate law and only taking on projects and cases where it is among the best in the field.
